mapper.insert: insert into gacha_activity_account_month (user_id,activity_id,month,month_count,month_count_surplus,create_time,update_time) values (#{userId}, #{activityId},#{month}, #{monthCount}, #{monthCountSurplus}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update gacha_activity_account_month set month_count_surplus = month_count_surplus -1, update_time = now() where activity_id=#{activityId} and user_id=#{userId} and month=#{month} and month_count_surplus>0
